features: Full HD monitor with 1920x1080 resolution and AOC brand technology; ideal for webinars, meetings, digital work, entertainment, and more
Includes a 27-inch flat panel monitor, an adjustable stand, a power cord, an HDMI cable, and a user manual
Input and output: (1) VGA, (1) DP 1.2, (2) USB-A, (1) USB-B, (1) HDMI 1.4 (HDCP compliant), and (1) audio 3.5 jack in/out
In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel technology delivers rich color production that can be viewed accurately from all angles
Stand tilts -5 to 20 degrees, offering an adjustable viewing angle
Energy Star certified; meets stringent energy efficiency requirements to reduce power consumption
Wall mountable; VESA compatible with 100x100mm hole pattern

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Full HD Monitor with Stand, Powered with AOC Technology Dynamic Full HD Monitor Featuring AOC brand technology, the Amazon Basics Full HD monitor is ideal for webcasts, digital work, gaming, and entertainment. IPS Panel Technology With 1920x1080 resolution and 75Hz frame rate, the monitor features IPS technology that produces accurate colors that are visible from every angle. Slim Design Featuring a sleek, frameless design with edge-to-edge picture quality, the monitor’s ultra-slim profile saves space and looks attractive. Additional Features Includes a stand that can tilt -5 degrees to 20 degrees, built-in speakers, and is VESA wall mount ready with a 100x100mm hole pattern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Monitor Display
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought the Amazon monitor, and it is just perfect when looking for great value and performance. The Full HD 1080P screen displays crystal clear and bright images perfect for both work and recreational use. 75Hz refresh rate ensures smooth transitions especially during gaming and video playing while VESA compatibility provides a range of mounting options. The built-in speakers that have rather good audio quality mean no need for external sound equipment. The sleek black appearance not only brings sophistication to my workspace but also fits perfectly with the monitor’s thin frame helping conserve space. Due to its cost-effectiveness, this monitor is one of the top picks in terms of functionality and price. I can definitely recommend this monitor to those looking for a reliable monitor display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful monitor with USB AND basic built-in speakers
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the image quality and brightness are remarkable. The built-in USB hub keeps me from having to plug in all my peripherals separately. The speakers are good enough for basic listening intelligibility, but not what I would want to use to listen to music.I bought this monitor to replace an aging 20 inch unit. The AmazonBasics monitor with AOC technology is considerably brighter and clearer than my old one. I used AOC monitors exclusively in the past so I expected good image quality and performance. This model did not disappoint.The buit-in speakers work reasonably well for sounds related to system notifications or spoken words. If you want to listen to music you will need an additional speaker. Thankfully there is an audio out and a headset port built into the monitor.My desk setup has the AmazonBasics monitor and another connected via hdmi to an Anker 553 USB-C hub. The AmazonBasics monitor is also connected to the Anker hub via the monitor’s USB B port. This allows me to leave my webcam, keyboard, and mouse plugged into the AmazonBasics monitor for a permanent desk setup. When I am ready to work I simply connect the single USB C cable from the Anker hub to my laptop. This single connection gives me access to everything I need thanks to the monitor’s built-in USB hub.When I purchased it in early 2023 it was $150. It is a great monitor at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this monitor for a secondary work screen... WHAT A WASTE! This monitor is so much better than just a work screen! The picture is gorgeous! It sounds great! Worth the purchase, for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Monitor, powered with AOC technology, offers a solid display experience with notable features. The FHD 1080P resolution ensures crisp visuals, while the 75Hz refresh rate adds fluidity to motion. The VESA compatibility allows for flexible mounting options, adapting to various setups. The inclusion of built-in speakers is a convenient addition for those looking to avoid external audio setups. While not necessarily tailored for advanced users, this monitor caters well to everyday tasks, providing good value for its price point. The sleek black design adds a touch of modernity to any workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, the best 24-inch IPS monitor amazon basics
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is ideal for writers, graphic designers, games, among others.It has many color settings to optimally and clearly display all the content.Its ultra-thin frames make it ideal for focusing your attention on work and increasing your productivity.The best monitor I've ever had, thank you very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought a used and it looks new and its good
reviews.reviewText: Definitely worth the money; it is better than other monitors in same price range

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good barebones monitor
reviews.reviewText: I needed a basic monitor for a remote office setup with infrequent use. I got tired of lugging a monitor back and forth for those rare occasions when I needed to sit down in front of something there. For the price, this monitor was perfect. Good size and good full HD picture quality. The inputs were just what I needed too since I have a variety of HDMI, DisplayPort and even an old system with VGA. All of those work fine and it means I could keep different ones connected and use the menu to switch to the input I need based on what computer I'm working on. I finally got to ditch my old DP to HDMI adapter I had been using with my old monitor which lacked DisplayPort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Monitor BUT Not So Good at Video
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a 27" monitor to use as a Roku video base. I needed this size and a center support. Traditional TVs jump from 24" to 32" and virtually all have wide legs. So, I looked for a monitor with built in speakers and lots of input options. This seemed to fit the bill. I plugged in a Roku stick and then learned a few things. First, i can't control the monitor volume or turn the unit on/off with the Roku remote. OK, I can work around that. Second, I can't turn the Roku on/off with the remote either since I am getting power from the monitor USB. Third, and probably most important, the sound quality of this monitor is atrociously bad. I will probably put this monitor into service as my new mac monitor and go buy a 24" Roku TV. Oh well, I tried!
